post.body: Thanks, I actually wrote that in May but totally forgot to post it up!
That's only because everyone's just afraid to be plain wrong and be accountable for their predictions come end 2009!
Seems like according to BusinessWeek, greentech and new energy is big in 2008... any predictions for 2009?
Environment here is small so it's expected I guess. Even new startups are often helmed by the same peopl!
Amen. It will be a good year for those believe it to be so.
Being Smart http://tinyurl.com/9cq7fr
Merry Christmas; Pledge Your Support For Underprivileged Children http://tinyurl.com/8ae39k
Loaded heaps of new songs into my iTunes. Rockin!
Seems like leaks are now de-rigeur in the mobile phone business... http://tinyurl.com/ayvpbz
Will telco ARPUs take a hit in the near future? http://tinyurl.com/8g542t
Wordpress 2.7 upgrade for my blog complete. This process is incredibly heart-stopping, for some reason.
Upgrading blog to Wordpress 2.7 now manually; hope everything goes well. ><
Received a "warning letter" from a legal debt collector for owing money. Seems like my flat's previous owner had been a very naughty boy.
Finally added Slideshare.net to my LinkedIn.com profile...
OMG I'm clearing through my stack of old business cards and found @derrickkoh's old EastWest name card.. didn't realize we met much earlier!
Meeting an ex-CNET Asia journo for lunch later. It's been a long time since we've last met in 2005!
Feeling extremely blessed over 2008...
Ahhh I can access ping.fm now.
Hmmm is ping.fm down?
I'm looking back at 2008 and suddenly realizing how blessed I am this year. I can't wait for 2009!
